title: Bruce Campbell And Lucy Lawless: Ash Vs. Evil Dead (R)
description: Bruce Campbell and Lucy Lawless talk about their beloved characters Ash and Xena and about their TV series Ash Vs. Evil Dead. This show originally aired on October 23, 2015.
